title: Rhyme Time
description: Find the word that rhymes with the given word! A fun phonics challenge.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'night'?
questions.explanation: 'Flight' rhymes with 'night' — both end with the '-ight' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'bear'?
questions.explanation: 'Share' rhymes with 'bear' — both end with the '-air' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'moon'?
questions.explanation: 'Tune' rhymes with 'moon' — both end with the '-oon' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'cake'?
questions.explanation: 'Lake' rhymes with 'cake' — both end with the '-ake' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'tree'?
questions.explanation: 'Free' rhymes with 'tree' — both end with the '-ee' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'gold'?
questions.explanation: 'Bold' rhymes with 'gold' — both end with the '-old' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'rain'?
questions.explanation: 'Train' rhymes with 'rain' — both end with the '-ain' sound. ('Rein' also rhymes, but 'train' is the best match here.)

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'bright'?
questions.explanation: 'Sight' rhymes with 'bright' — both end with the '-ight' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'house'?
questions.explanation: 'Mouse' rhymes with 'house' — both end with the '-ouse' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'chair'?
questions.explanation: 'Stair' rhymes with 'chair' — both end with the '-air' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'boat'?
questions.explanation: 'Coat' rhymes with 'boat' — both end with the '-oat' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'star'?
questions.explanation: 'Car' rhymes with 'star' — both end with the '-ar' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'ring'?
questions.explanation: 'Sing' rhymes with 'ring' — both end with the '-ing' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'day'?
questions.explanation: 'Play' rhymes with 'day' — both end with the '-ay' sound.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'ball'?
questions.explanation: 'Tall' rhymes with 'ball' — both end with the '-all' sound.
